Salesforce Surveys Object Model.name: Salesforce Surveys Object Model
Salesforce Surveys Object Model.description: Learn about how Salesforce Surveys objects relate to one another in Salesforce.

ActiveVersionID.description: The ID of the survey version currently activated.

Description.description: The description of the survey. This field isn’t visible in the UI.

IsPartialSaveEnabled.description: Indicates whether to save the partial responses for the survey (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the current user last viewed a record related to the survey.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed the survey.

LatestVersionId.description: The ID of the most recent version of this survey.

Name.description: The name of the survey that appears in the UI. This field is read-only from API version 50.0.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation. The namespace prefix can have one of the following values. In Developer Edition orgs, NamespacePrefix is set to the namespace prefix of the org for all objects that support it, unless an object is in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer Edition org of the package developer. In orgs that are not Developer Edition orgs, NamespacePrefix is set only for objects that are part of an installed managed package. All other objects have no namespace prefix.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the survey.

SurveyType.description: Type of the survey. The default value is Survey. Possible values are: ASSESSMENT — Survey type for sales enablement teams. Available from API version 58.0 and later. BASIC — Survey with a question page with like or dislike, long text, multiple selection, NPS, rating, short text, and single selection questions, and without inserted participant responses, display logic, and page branching logic. SURVEY — Survey with all the available features.

TotalVersionsCount.description: The number of versions of the survey.

SurveyEmailBranding.name: SurveyEmailBranding
SurveyEmailBranding.description: Represents the configuration settings for invitation emails sent to survey participants for a particular survey.

Body.description: The body text of the invitation email.

DeveloperName.description: The unique API name of the email branding configuration.

FooterImageId.description: The ID of the content asset that appears in the footer of the invitation email.

FromEmailAddress.description: The email address that appears in the “From” field when the invitation is sent to participants.

HeaderImageId.description: The ID of the content asset that appears in the header of the invitation email.

Language.description: The language of the emails. Available languages include: Chinese (Simplified) Chinese (Traditional) Danish Dutch English Finnish French German Italian Japanese Korean Norwegian Portuguese (Brazilian) Russian Spanish Spanish (Mexican) Swedish Thai

MasterLabel.description: The label for these email configuration settings.

Subject.description: The subject of the invitation email.

SurveyEngagementContext.name: SurveyEngagementContext
SurveyEngagementContext.description: Represents the context based on which a survey invitation was sent or a survey response was received.

ContextType.description: Context type based on which the survey invitation was sent or the response was received.

ContextValue.description: Context based on which the survey invitation was sent or the response was received.

SurveyInvitation.name: SurveyInvitation
SurveyInvitation.description: Represents the invitation sent to a participant to complete the survey.

CommunityId.description: The ID of the Experience Cloud site that you want to send the survey to.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact who received the invitation. This field is available in API v49.0 and later.

EmailBrandingId.description: The ID of the survey email branding object that’s associated with this invitation.

InvitationLink.description: The URL to the survey that is sent to participants. To query on this field, you need access to the associated Survey record.

InviteExpiryDateTime.description: The date and time that the survey invitation expires.

IsDefault.description: Determines whether this is the default survey invitation to use when the survey is sent to participants.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this survey invitation.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this survey invitation.

LeadId.description: ID of the lead who received the invitation. This field is available in API v49.0 and later.

Name.description: The name of the survey invitation that appears in the UI.

OptionsAllowGuestUserResponse.description: Determines whether participants who don’t have a Salesforce account can complete the survey.

OptionsAllowParticipantAccessTheirRespon.description: Determines whether participants can access a copy of their responses after they complete the survey.

OptionsCollectAnonymousResponse.description: Determines whether participants can complete the survey anonymously.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the survey invitation.

ParticipantId.description: ID of the participant if the participant is a Salesforce contact, user, or lead.

ResponseStatus.description: The status of a participant’s response to the survey that’s associated with the survey invitation. Possible values include: NotStarted — For an invitation with a ParticipantID, it means that the recipient hasn’t opened the survey. For an invitation without the ParticipantID, it means that none of the recipients have opened the survey. Started — For an invitation with a ParticipantID, it means that the recipient opened the survey. For an invitation without the ParticipantID, it means that the survey has been opened by at least one recipient. Paused — For an invitation with a ParticipantID, it means that the recipient has paused the survey. For an invitation without the ParticipantID, it means that the survey has been paused by any one of the recipients. Paused isn't available for invitations in which either OptionsAllowParticipantAccessTheirResponse or OptionsCollectAnonymousResponse is true. PartiallyCompleted— For an invitation with a ParticipantID field, it means that the recipient has partially completed the survey. For an invitation without the ParticipantID field, it means that at least one recipient has partially completed the survey. Available in API version 63.0 and later. Completed — For an invitation with a ParticipantID, it means that the recipient has submitted the survey. For an invitation without the ParticipantID, it means that the invitation has been submitted by at least one recipient.

SurveyId.description: ID of the survey that’s sent in the invitation.

UUID.description: A unique user ID that's added to a survey invitation generated for a contact, lead,or user.

UserId.description: ID of the user who received the invitation. This field is available in API v49.0 and later.

SurveyPage.name: SurveyPage
SurveyPage.description: Represents a page, such as the title page or a question page, in a survey.

DeveloperName.description: The unique API name of this SurveyPage object.

Name.description: The name of the survey page that appears in the UI.

SurveyVersionId.description: The version of the survey that the page belongs to.

SurveyQuestion.name: SurveyQuestion
SurveyQuestion.description: Represents a question in a survey.

DeveloperName.description: The API name of the SurveyQuestion. The API name must be unique within a particular version of the survey.

IsDeprecated.description: Indicates whether the question was deleted from the survey.

Name.description: Up to the first 250 characters of the label for the question.

PageDisplayOrder.description: The order in which the page is displayed. This field is available in API version 54.0 and later.

PageName.description: The label for the page. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

QuestionChoiceCount.description: The number of choices for the question. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

QuestionOrder.description: The order in which the question is displayed.

QuestionType.description: The type of question. Possible values include: Boolean—This value is available in API v49.0 and later. CSAT Currency Date DateTime FreeText Image Matrix—This value is available in API v55.0 and later. MultipleChoice MultiSelectPicklist NPS Number Picklist RadioButton StackRank Rating ShortText—This value is available in API v49.0 and later. Slider Toggle

RelatedQuestionId.description: The ID of the parent question. This field is blank when the question itself is the parent question. This field is available in API v55.0 and later, with Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses.

SubQuestionDisplayOrder.description: The order in which the question is displayed within the parent question. This field is available in API v55.0 and later, with Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses.

SurveyPageId.description: Lookup to the SurveyPage that contains the question.

SurveyVersionId.description: The ID of the SurveyVersion that the question belongs to.

ValidationType.description: The validations available for the short-text question. Possible values include: Custom - Cu Number - Nu

SurveyQuestionChoice.name: SurveyQuestionChoice
SurveyQuestionChoice.description: Represents an answer choice that a participant can select for a survey question.

DeveloperName.description: The unique API name of the SurveyQuestionChoice object.

DisplayOrder.description: The order in which the question choice is displayed within the parent question. This field is available in API v55.0 and later, with Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses.

IsDeprecated.description: Indicates whether a question choice was deleted from the survey.

Name.description: A label for the question choice that appears in the UI.

QuestionId.description: The ID of the SurveyQuestion object that this choice belongs to.

SurveyVersionId.description: The version of the survey that this question choice belongs to.

SurveyQuestionResponse.name: SurveyQuestionResponse
SurveyQuestionResponse.description: Represents a participant’s answer to a specific question.

ChoiceValue.description: Response provided by a participant for the following question types: Multiple choice Picklist Radio Ranking

Datatype.type: Filter, Group, Nillable, Restricted picklist, Sort

DateTimeValue.description: Response provided by a participant for a question of the type date time.

DateValue.description: Response provided by a participant for a question of the type date.

InvitationId.description: The ID of the SurveyInvitation that was sent to the survey participant.

IsTrueOrFalse.description: Response provided by a participant for a question type which has only two possible values: True and False.

NumberValue.description: Response provided by a participant for the following question types: Net Promoter Score (NPS) Rating Score Slider

QuestionChoiceId.description: The ID of SurveyQuestionChoice that a participant chose in response to a question.

QuestionId.description: The ID of the SurveyQuestion that a participant provided an answer for.

Rank.description: Rank provided by a participant for an answer choice for the ranking question type.

ResponseId.description: The ID of the SurveyResponse that is the parent of this SurveyQuestionResponse.

ResponseShortText.description: Up to the first 250 characters of the response provided by a participant for a text type question.

ResponseValue.description: Response provided by a participant for a question.

SurveyVersionId.description: The ID of the SurveyVersion that the response belongs to.

SurveyQuestionScore.name: SurveyQuestionScore
SurveyQuestionScore.description: Represents the aggregate of responses for the following question types: date, multiple choice, picklist, radio, ranking, rating, scoring, slider, and Net Promoter Score® (NPS®).

CumulativeScore.description: Sum of the responses provided by all the participants for a question of the following types: rating, scoring, and slider. For a question of the type ranking, sum of the weights provided by all the participants for each item.

DateResponse.description: The date selected by one or more participants for a question of the type date.

Name.description: For an overall score type record: Name of a question. Name of an item in a question of the type ranking.

QuestionChoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the answer choice selected by one or more participants. For an individual score type record, this field is applicable for questions of the following types: picklist, radio, multi choice, ranking and rating. For an overall score type record, this field is applicable for questions of the type ranking.

QuestionDeveloperName.description: The API name of the question for which response is recorded. The API name must be unique within a particular version of the survey.

QuestionId.description: Unique identifier of the question for which response is recorded.

QuestionName.description: Name of the question for which response is recorded.

QuestionSkippedCount.description: Number of participants who didn’t respond to the question.

ResponseCount.description: For an overall score type record, number of participants who responded to the question. For an individual score type record, number of participants who selected a particular answer choice.

ResponseValue.description: Answer choice selected by one or more participants for a question of the following types: rating, slider, score, NPS. Rank provided by the participant for an item in a question of the type ranking.

Score.description: For an individual score type record, percentage of participants who selected a particular answer choice. Note For questions of the type ranking, the percentage of participants who have provided the same rank to an item.

ScoreType.description: Type of the score calculated for a record. Possible values are: Individual Overall

SurveyId.description: Unique identifier of the survey that contains the question for which scores are calculated.

SurveyInvitationId.description: Unique identifier of the survey invitation for which scores are calculated.

SurveyVersionId.description: Unique identifier of the survey version for which scores are calculated.

SurveyResponse.name: SurveyResponse
SurveyResponse.description: Represents information about a participant’s response to a survey, such as the status of the response, the participant’s location, and when the survey was completed.

CompletionDateTime.description: The date and time that the participant completed the survey.

DataMapperExecutionStatus.description: Status of all the survey data maps after a response is received. This field is available in API v49.0 and later, with Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses.

InterviewGuid.description: An automatically-generated, unique ID for a saved survey response.

InterviewId.description: The ID of the FlowInterview object that’s associated with this response.

InvitationId.description: The ID of the SurveyInvitation object that’s associated with this response.

IpAddress.description: The IP address of the device the participant used to take the survey.

Language.description: The language that the participant used to complete the survey.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that another Salesforce object last referenced this SurveyResponse object.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time that someone last viewed this SurveyResponse object.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the participant’s location.

Location.description: The latitude and longitude coordinates of the participant’s location.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the participant’s location.

Status.description: The status of the survey. Possible values include: NotStarted — The participant hasn't opened the survey. Started — The participant has opened the survey. Paused — The participant has paused the survey. Paused isn't available for invitations in which either OptionsAllowParticipantAccessTheirResponse or OptionsCollectAnonymousResponse is true. PartiallyCompleted — The participant has partially completed the survey. Available in API version 63.0 and later. Completed — The participant has completed the survey.

SubmitterId.description: The ID of the Salesforce user, contact, or lead who completed the survey.

SurveyId.description: The ID of the survey that the participant completed.

SurveyVersionId.description: The ID of the version of the survey that the participant completed.

SurveySubject.name: SurveySubject
SurveySubject.description: Represents a relationship between a survey and another object, such as an account or a case.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the SurveySubject record was last referenced by another object.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed the SurveySubject record.

Name.description: The name of the SurveySubject record.

ParentId.description: Unique identifier of the SurveyInvitation object or SurveyResponse object that is associated with this survey-object relationship.

SubjectEntityType.description: Object that the survey is associated with. Possible values include: Account Asset Banker BranchUnit BranchUnitBusinessMember BranchUnitCustomer BusinessLicenseApplication BusinessMilestone Campaign CareProgram Case Claim ClaimParticipant Contact Employee Event Incident IndividualApplication InsurancePolicy InsurancePolicyParticipant Lead LearningItemSubmission—Available in API version 58.0 and later. LiveChatTranscript LoyaltyProgram LoyaltyProgramMember LoyaltyProgramPartner MaterialityStakeholder MessagingSession Opportunity Order PersonalLifeEvent Producer Product2 Promotion RebateProgram RetailStore ServiceAppointment ServiceResource Solution Task TransactionJournal User VideoCall Visit VoiceCall VolunteerProject WorkOrder Custom Objects

SubjectId.description: The ID of the object that’s associated with the survey.

SurveyId.description: Unique identifier of the survey that’s associated with the record that’s represented by SubjectId.

SurveyInvitationId.description: Unique identifier of the survey invitation that's associated with another object.

SurveyResponseId.description: Unique identifier of the survey response that's associated with another object.

SurveyVersion.name: SurveyVersion
SurveyVersion.description: Represents a version of a survey.

BrandingSetId.description: The ID of the branding set associated with the survey version.

Description.description: The description of this survey version.

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the survey version is a template. Template surveys are automatically shared with all users in your Salesforce org.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the current user last viewed a record related to the survey version.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed the survey version.

SurveyId.description: The ID of the survey associated with the survey version.

SurveyStatus.description: The status of the survey. Possible values include: Active Draft Obsolete InvalidDraft

VersionNumber.description: The version number of the survey.

SurveyVersionAddlInfo.name: SurveyVersionAddlInfo
SurveyVersionAddlInfo.description: Represents additional information about a survey version. This information defines the default settings of a survey version.

EmailSender.description: The organization-wide email address used to send a survey invitation.

EmailTemplateId.description: ID of the email template that's used to send an automated survey invitation.

EngagementContextMetadata.description: The custom metadata created to get the engagement context from the participants.

InvitationSharingRole.description: Indicates the users that share edit access to a survey invitation.

Language.description: Language used to create the survey.

SurveyQuestionId.description: ID of the survey question embedded in the email template used to send automated survey invitations.

SurveyVersionId.description: ID of the survey version. This field is unique within your organization
